subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ slugging catcher Buster Posey was voted the N.L. rookie of the year, and the Rangers closer Neftali Feliz earned the award in the A.L.
snippet: The Giants’ slugging catcher Buster Posey was voted the N.L. rookie of the year, and the Rangers closer Neftali Feliz earned the award in the A.L.
